summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2497, for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Southwest from the north line of Star Addition to West Seattle, to West Spokane Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 27362 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
